sentences.sentence: But the education of the bottler and his staff had only just begun.
sentences.translation: 但是对灌装厂以及其工作人员的教育才刚刚开始。

sentences.sentence: The bottler has been struggling to revive soft-drink sales in the U.S..
sentences.translation: 该公司一直竭力振兴在美国的软饮料销售。

sentences.sentence: Last year the local bottler blanketed streets with drink coolers and Coke signage.
sentences.translation: 去年，地方的瓶装商用饮料冰箱和可乐招牌包裹着街道。
